actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).

official_title: To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2014 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.
short_title: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2014

titles.title: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2014

To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2014 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.
